summary: 调用GetAccountDeletionCheckResult查询成员删除检查结果。

Status.description:
检查状态。取值：

- PreCheckComplete：检查完成。
- PreChecking：检查中。

AllowDelete.description:
是否允许删除。取值：
- true：允许删除。
- false：不允许删除。

NotAllowReason.description:
不允许删除的原因。
> 当AllowDelete为false时，返回该参数值。

items.description:
不允许删除的原因。
> 当AllowDelete为false时，返回该参数值。

Description.example: This account is an Enterprise Finance associated account. Please remove the financial association of this account before deleting it.

CheckName.description: 检查项所属的云服务名称。

AbandonableChecks.description:
您可以选择放弃并继续执行成员删除的检查项。

> 当AllowDelete为true时，可能返回该参数值。

items.description:
您可以选择放弃并继续执行成员删除的检查项。
> 当AllowDelete为true时，可能返回该参数值。

Description.example: 存在云产品实例运行，请联系客服人员提工单处理。

CheckName.description: 检查项所属的云服务名称。

404.errorMessage: This resource directory account does not exist.
The resource directory for the account is not enabled. We recommend that you first enable the resource directory for the account.

409.errorMessage: You cannot perform the action on the member account.
There is no check task for this account
The deletion failed. An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.

  "RequestId": "54AC391D-4F7F-5F08-B8D3-0AECDE6EC5BD",

    "AllowDelete": "false",
    "NotAllowReason": [
      {
        "Description": "This account is an Enterprise Finance associated account. Please remove the financial association of this account before deleting it.",
        "CheckId": "NON_SP_efc",
        "CheckName": "Enterprise finance"
      }
    ],
    "AbandonableChecks": [
      {
        "Description": "存在云产品实例运行，请联系客服人员提工单处理。",
        "CheckId": "NON_SP_cs",
        "CheckName": "容器服务"
      }
    ]
  }
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<GetAccountDeletionCheckResultResponse>
    <AccountDeletionCheckResultInfo>
        <Status>PreCheckComplete</Status>
        <NotAllowReason>
            <Description>instance number:1</Description>
            <CheckName>eip_pre</CheckName>
            <CheckId>SP_eip_eip_pre</CheckId>
        </NotAllowReason>
        <NotAllowReason>
            <Description>This account is an Enterprise Finance associated account. Please remove the financial association of this account before deleting it.</Description>
            <CheckName>Enterprise finance</CheckName>
            <CheckId>NON_SP_efc</CheckId>
        </NotAllowReason>
        <AllowDelete>false</AllowDelete>
    </AccountDeletionCheckResultInfo>
    <RequestId>54AC391D-4F7F-5F08-B8D3-0AECDE6EC5BD</RequestId>
</GetAccountDeletionCheckResultResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询成员删除检查结果
description:
在您调用[CheckAccountDelete](~~448542~~)执行了成员删除检查任务后，您可以调用GetAccountDeletionCheckResult查询成员删除检查的结果。如果符合删除检查要求，则该成员允许删除；否则，请手动处理不符合项，直至符合要求为止。

本文将提供一个示例，查询待删除成员`179855839641****`的删除检查结果。返回结果显示，该成员不符合删除要求。
requestParamsDescription: 关于公共请求参数的详情，请参见[公共参数](~~159973~~)。
